bibl.title: Sites and Sights of the Iron Age
bibl.note: British Museum GR 1994.10-1.2. Terracotta figure of a Gaulish warrior, late third or early second century B.C. - Non vidimus. Cf. Eleni VASSILIKA, Museum Acquisitions, 1994, JEA 82 (1996) p. 194.
BAILEY Donald M., A Gaul from Egypt.
B. RAFTERY (Ed.), Sites and Sights of the Iron Age = Oxbow Monograph 56 (Oxford, 1995) pp. 1-3, figg.
